original_text: So the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel, and he sold them into the hand of the Philistines and into the hand of the Ammonites,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하사 블레셋 사람들의 손과 암몬 자손의 손에 그들을 파시매

sentences.original_text: So the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 여호와의 진노가 이스라엘을 향하여 타올랐고

sentences.original_text: and he sold them into the hand of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 블레셋 사람의 손에 팔았으며

sentences.original_text: and into the hand of the Ammonites
